name: Oscar's World Tour
description:
Oscar is back, with more great fun and
zany non-stop action, set over seven
new exciting Worlds: America, The
Oceans, Africa, The Islands, Europe,
Arctic & Antarctic and The Far East.
Your mission is to swim, fly and run
through these Worlds collecting baby
Oscars that have become scattered
throughout the levels, armed with
your secret weapon, a Yo-Yo that you
can use to swing from platform to
platform and also zap those nasty
enemies in some of the craziest
platform levels youâ€™ll ever play.
